description: Row sums of (signed) triangle A060821 (Hermite polynomials).
links: Index entries for sequences related to Hermite polynomials
formula: a(n) = sum_{m=0..n} A060821(n, m) = H(n, 1), with the Hermite polynomials H(n, x).E.g.f.: exp(-x*(x-2)).a(n) = 2*(a(n - 1) - (n - 1)*a(n - 2)). - _Roger L. Bagula_, Sep 11 2006
maple: A062267 := proc(n)    HermiteH(n,1) ;    simplify(%) ;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Feb 05 2013
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jun 19 2001
